      doing it now

      way more than that

11.13.20  1:14 pm   what's your favorite song by you

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

11.13.20  1:08 pm   Do you have a favorite four-bar progression?

      no

11.13.20  12:49 pm   how do i Create a B Section for my song 

      no one knows for sure. just remember that anything is possible

11.13.20  12:49 pm   how did the sign in im best friends with my own front door get bad bad

      i'll tell you exactly how it happened. i was on a brand new break-neck schedule, where i was supposed to finish a song/video every 2 weeks, which was so much tighter than i had ever previously done it (at least 4x quicker), that no one believed was possible. so this is supposedly the first song of this new scheme, which essentially seems more like a dare at this point, because it's so absurd. So i had spent an entire day songwriting and i pretty much only made it through 2 stanzas. so the next day i had to kick myself and realize that this schedule is so ridiculous that i need to finish the song in the next 4 hours or it's pretty much game over. the 'sign' bit is the first bit to be written under that assumption. so in a way you can probably assume that this is the feeling of realizing i am going to have to steamroll the entire remainder of the songwriting process for this song. And i should clarify, steamrolling sometimes leads to fantastic growth, and i am thrilled with where the song ends up going, especially toward the end. and i don't think it would have ever gone like that, had the prior steamrolling not occured. it's a lesson that continues to play out again and again in the creative process, in the context of a world with limited time and resources

11.13.20  12:36 pm   How do you deal with stressful situations? 

      sing songs of joy

11.13.20  12:19 pm   you've made quite a lot of songs and videos. when you get questions referring to specific aspects of your past work (explaining a chord progression, analyzing a line of dialogue, etc) do you typically remember everything well enough to answer off the top of your head, given all the time you put into your content?

     not always

     or do you frequently have to go back to the source to refresh yourself on the context?

     sometimes, although i try to avoid it

      if so, how does it feel to revisit things you might not have even thought about in years?

     sort of a tingling sensation, kind of like eating a bug

      thanks bill

11.13.20  11:56 am   How to music

      start by hitting things, to find the most interesting to hit. if none of them are interesting you will have to hit them in an interesting pattern to thereby force it to be interesting

11.13.20  10:58 am   What is funny?

      2 sheriffs arguing over who gets to be sheriff

11.13.20  10:54 am   do you compose or improvise your synth solos?

     mostly improvise, except for when it quotes the melody

      they're quite melodic and i love them

11.13.20  10:51 am   how did you learn to sing?

      i'm not really sure

11.13.20  10:47 am   What are some of your favorite combinations of things?

      ups and downs

11.13.20  10:04 am   How do i make music?

      sometimes a little reverse psychology may work beautifully

11.13.20  9:57 am   Is "The moon is made of cheese(but I can't taste it)" a metaphorical critique of the 16th century catholic church from the perspective of Martin Luther?

      no

11.13.20  9:48 am   This year has been hitting hard. I need your songs. Please make a song soon. I've watched the others thousands of times.

      i've already made 2 and i am working on the video for one of them, but there will be many more after that

11.13.20  8:59 am   What kind of music do you listen to?

      post office

11.13.20  8:51 am   what new things are you learning?

      how to accomplish finite things despite being blinded by the allure of infinity. it's not new for me to be learning this, but i still can't seem to do it so therefore it still counts as a new thing i'm learning

11.13.20  8:40 am   Was there any videos/songs you made that at the VERY moment you were uploading it you felt contented with the final product and not frustrated that you could do better?

      most of the time i feel half contented. some sort of negotiational agreement is usually reached

11.13.20  8:34 am   what are you working on right now?

      it's one of those songs where it has a music video also, to go along with the song. released as a video, and also as just the song so you can listen to it on-the-go if you prefer

11.13.20  8:10 am   what time signature is i'm crazy/it's raining in?

      4, with some very occasional 1 or 2 beat waits put in

11.13.20  7:21 am   Would you plan on doing the history of the coronavirus?

     doing the history of very new things can backfire

     I think it would be interesting.

11.13.20  5:58 am   bill you promised in your wfaoie.fcp video that you would talk about velcro next

     it doesn't say next, and i will also point out that that video is drenched in satire

     when are you gonna talk about velcro

11.13.20  5:23 am   Do simple questions usually have complicated answers?

      no

11.13.20  3:14 am   I see lots of folks asking what your favorite song you've made is, and you always say you want the next one to be your favorite. What makes a song worth being favorited?

     no one knows for sure

      Are there any songs you're less proud of, or do you prefer to look at them all equally?

      they are all such an intense bundle of feelings, of proud and unproud

11.13.20  3:06 am   How/where did you learn music?

      at home, and in the workplace

11.13.20  2:29 am   How can I experience your stuff like it was the first time again ? 

      you could watch the new ones i'm making

      no

     this is getting back to my original topic that i wanted to discuss with you, which is do you still follow an all-eggyolk diet

     Was the "Might Quit" song a joke or was it for real?

     that's a real song but it's not about me, or youtube
